#summary Color Select Dialog (HSV palette)

= Overview =

This is a library you can use in your apps to provide the users with a color choice. Hope you will have fun using it.
Features:

  * HSV palette
  * orientations
    * portrait
    * landscape
  * fit screen sizes
    * small, medium (1x)
    * large (2x)
    * xlarge/tablets (3x)
  * strings (localization) free
